title: jansonandris
author: jansonandris
content: Unfortunately, my experience at this casino turned out to be very unsuccessful, although I read positive reviews about MBit and trusted this casino. On July 12, I won 4,719 LTC. I played mostly Panda fortune 2, North guardians, 100 zombies, 7 bonus up, Ancient Troy, and Aus dem Tal. I, as expected, following all the rules and requirements, sent a selfie with a piece of paper and a passport, a passport, and a bank statement. I wrote to the chat and to the mail, but I did not receive any response. It's a pity. I've already seen several complaints about MBit here, but I still don't understand how they ended. Do you think I have any chance of getting my money back?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: When you have tried all your best but your money is still with the gambling site, you will have to tell your lawyer about it, that is where such case can appropriate start from. But you know that you have a lot to spend.Only do this if you know that you did nothing wrong.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: 4,719 LTC is really a big amount, you must do anything in order to get your money. There's a recent accusation that has been resolved after contacting BTCGosu I can't withdraw my winnings from the MBit Casino for 2 months. Please help!!! you can try it. Hire a lawyer might be a good idea, but beware of fake lawyer that would contact you directly and promise to solve your problem.You may have a chance to get back your money, but since the mBit representative in this forum isn't active, so you can't expect anything expect a third party that associated with the casino.

comments.author: jansonandris
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on September 08, 2022, 09:29:48 AM4,719 LTC is really a big amount, you must do anything in order to get your money. There's a recent accusation that has been resolved after contacting BTCGosu I can't withdraw my winnings from the MBit Casino for 2 months. Please help!!! you can try it. Hire a lawyer might be a good idea, but beware of fake lawyer that would contact you directly and promise to solve your problem.You may have a chance to get back your money, but since the mBit representative in this forum isn't active, so you can't expect anything expect a third party that associated with the casino.I think I have shown all the wonders of patience  I don't see the point of throwing tantrums and insulting someone. This is often completely pointless. However, I would really like to sort out this situation, because I did everything right, sort of. It's very unpleasant, because the support simply ignores me.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 06:47:33 AMI've already seen several complaints about MBit here, but I still don't understand how they ended. If the accusation is resolved then the topic is locked and the title is changed to resolved if not then it will continue to be open as long as the thread started to keep it open, you can use the forum search bar for the status of the other complaintsQuoteDo you think I have any chance of getting my money back? What makes your case different from other complaints they are all ignored so your chances are slim unless Mbit changed its way and resolves these complaints.

comments.author: MelodyRowell
comments.body: Good day. I am very sorry that you have such a situation. Indeed, the representative of MBit Casino has not been on this forum for a long time, which means that complaints are not being considered. However, not so long ago another user wanted to file a complaint against the license provider and after that the thread was closed. I'm not sure if something worked out for him, but you can read this thread. Here it is

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on September 08, 2022, 03:29:37 PMI bet him and the other guy who just made a scam accusation about them are the same person.Same writing, both regged within the last 2 days.It's possible unless both show their transactions and screenshots of their dashboard, that they are of a different person, but we can assume that they are, given the circumstances that you mentioned if it is true then it's a bad strategy for the complainant to strengthen his case.QuoteI would think the site might have their reasonÂ  (multi accounting) .Unless Mbit shows up here and shows their proof that there is a case of multi-accounting, this is why when it comes to scam accusations proofs are important so we can verify whose side is right.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 06:47:33 AMI've already seen several complaints about MBit here, but I still don't understand how they ended. Do you think I have any chance of getting my money back? So you have done all the necessary procedures to make a withdrawal? can you recheck the email, is it true that until now there has been no reply from support?if looking at your explanation without any evidence, I don't think you have received a ban on accessing your account. it should be easy to contact support. add some of your evidence. but anyone on this forum, I'm not sure anyone can help with your money.looking at the current situation, I am quite concerned, you have to admit that it will be difficult to get your money back.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 12:04:48 PMQuote from: Jawhead999 on September 08, 2022, 09:29:48 AM4,719 LTC is really a big amount, you must do anything in order to get your money. There's a recent accusation that has been resolved after contacting BTCGosu I can't withdraw my winnings from the MBit Casino for 2 months. Please help!!! you can try it. Hire a lawyer might be a good idea, but beware of fake lawyer that would contact you directly and promise to solve your problem.You may have a chance to get back your money, but since the mBit representative in this forum isn't active, so you can't expect anything expect a third party that associated with the casino.I think I have shown all the wonders of patience  I don't see the point of throwing tantrums and insulting someone. This is often completely pointless. However, I would really like to sort out this situation, because I did everything right, sort of. It's very unpleasant, because the support simply ignores me. have you tried reporting this to their license provider? if you have the necessary proof supporting your claim you might have a case against them. also, would you mind sharing evidence like screenshots of emails, chats etc... supporting your claim?note that newbie accounts can't post the images but you can post the link to the images. try using imgur to upload the images and share the link of the photos on your Original post.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 12:04:48 PMQuote from: Jawhead999 on September 08, 2022, 09:29:48 AM4,719 LTC is really a big amount, you must do anything in order to get your money. There's a recent accusation that has been resolved after contacting BTCGosu I can't withdraw my winnings from the MBit Casino for 2 months. Please help!!! you can try it. Hire a lawyer might be a good idea, but beware of fake lawyer that would contact you directly and promise to solve your problem.You may have a chance to get back your money, but since the mBit representative in this forum isn't active, so you can't expect anything expect a third party that associated with the casino.I think I have shown all the wonders of patience  I don't see the point of throwing tantrums and insulting someone. This is often completely pointless. However, I would really like to sort out this situation, because I did everything right, sort of. It's very unpleasant, because the support simply ignores me. No, you did not do everything right, your accusation did not have weight because there is no proof that you provided us for us to see if you're really telling the right thing, we don't know if you're cheating the casino that is why they did not let you withdraw, you can make a difference by providing proofs to help us verified and strengthen the other accusations that MBIT is indeed a scam casino and the complaints are not isolated and they have intentions to scam people.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 06:47:33 AMI won 4,719 LTC.Did I see the similar number of LTC case before? It looks very familiar.You need to provide some proof against your accusations. There are some formatting suggestions, please follow it.I think there are many MBit casino accusations are posting lately in the forum. Unfortunately there are no active user who represent them too. I left a red feedback for them from another accusation though.Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 07, 2022, 05:02:45 PMUpdate: Profile found https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=262691But it seems they are not active on the forum from long time.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 10, 2022, 12:14:25 AMQuote from: jansonandris on September 08, 2022, 06:47:33 AMI won 4,719 LTC.Did I see the similar number of LTC case before? It looks very familiar.you are probably thinking about the LTC casino issue. the OP there had a complaint about not being able to withdraw his 1496LTC and was being accused of abusing a bug or something but the issue between the user and LTC casino has now been resolved. that being said, If I remember correctly the OP has a 300LTC withdrawal limit so I don't think he has withdrawn all his remaining funds from the casino.
